a.definition: The first letter of the English alphabet

ability.definition: The capacity or skill to do something
examples: She has the ability to solve complex problems

able.definition: Having the power, skill, or means to do something
examples: He is able to speak three languages

above.definition: In or to a higher place
examples: The bird flew above the trees
According to the weather report, it will rain

across.definition: From one side to the other

examples: Take action to solve the problem

activity.definition: A thing that a person or group does

add.definition: To put together with something else

address.definition: The location where someone lives or works

administration.definition: The management of a business or organization
examples: The school administration made new rules
He had to admit his mistake

adult.definition: A person who is fully grown
examples: Children must be accompanied by an adult

affect.definition: To make a change to something
examples: The rain will affect our picnic plans

age.definition: The length of time someone has lived

examples: The travel agency booked our flight

agent.definition: A person who acts on behalf of another
examples: The real estate agent showed us the house
I met him two years ago

air.definition: The mixture of gases we breathe
examples: Fresh air is good for health
I'm almost finished with my work
She is also coming to the party
Although it's raining, we'll go out

american.definition: Relating to America or its people

among.definition: In the middle of; surrounded by

and.definition: Used to connect words or phrases

animal.definition: A living creature that can move
examples: The dog is a friendly animal
Would you like another cup of tea?
What is the answer to this problem?

any.definition: One or some, regardless of which

examples: Is there anything I can do to help?

appear.definition: To come into sight; to seem

apply.definition: To put to use; to request formally

approach.definition: To come near or closer to

examples: This area is known for its restaurants

argue.definition: To give reasons for or against

arm.definition: The upper limb of the human body
examples: He broke his arm playing football
The train will arrive at 3 PM

article.definition: A piece of writing; a particular item
examples: I read an interesting article today
The artist painted a beautiful landscape
Ask me if you need help
Don't assume you know the answer
Meet me at the park at 5 PM
The dog might attack if threatened
She will attempt to climb the mountain

attention.definition: The act of focusing on something

examples: The attorney represented his client well

audience.definition: A group of people watching or listening

examples: The author signed copies of her book
The teacher has authority in the classroom

available.definition: Able to be used or obtained

examples: I'll be back in an hour
Pack your clothes in the bag

ball.definition: A round object used in games

examples: I need to go to the bank

bar.definition: A place that serves alcoholic drinks
examples: They met at the local bar

be.definition: To exist; to have the quality of
examples: To be or not to be

become.definition: To grow to be; to come to be
examples: She wants to become a doctor

bed.definition: A piece of furniture for sleeping

examples: This is the best pizza in town

between.definition: In the space separating two things

beyond.definition: On the far side of; more than

bill.definition: A statement of charges; paper money

examples: Just a bit of sugar, please

blood.definition: The red liquid in the body

board.definition: A flat piece of wood; a group of directors

body.definition: The physical structure of a person

both.definition: The two; one and the other

box.definition: A container with sides and a lid
examples: Put the toys in the box

break.definition: To separate into pieces; a pause

examples: My brother is older than me
We need to stick to our budget
They will build a new school

building.definition: A structure with walls and a roof
examples: The office building is very tall
I like coffee but not tea
She took photos with her camera

campaign.definition: An organized effort to achieve a goal

can.definition: To be able to; a metal container
examples: I can help you with that
Early detection of cancer saves lives

capital.definition: The main city of a country
examples: Paris is the capital of France
She has a successful career in law
In this case, we should wait
Meet me at the town center
Learning a language is a challenge
Give me a chance to explain

character.definition: A person in a story; moral qualities

charge.definition: To ask for payment; to rush forward

check.definition: To examine; a written order for money

examples: The child is learning to read

choice.definition: An option; the act of choosing

examples: They go to church on Sundays
New York is a big city

class.definition: A group of students; a category

examples: Speak clearly so I can understand

collection.definition: A group of objects gathered together

color.definition: The appearance of things in light

community.definition: A group of people living together

examples: She works for a tech company

computer.definition: An electronic device for processing data
examples: I use my computer for work
The car is in good condition
What's the cost of this item?

could.definition: Past tense of can; might be able to

course.definition: A series of lessons; a path

court.definition: A place where legal cases are heard

examples: Cover the pot with a lid

culture.definition: The customs and beliefs of a group

current.definition: Happening now; a flow of water

customer.definition: A person who buys goods or services

cut.definition: To divide with a sharp tool

examples: Decide what you want to eat

degree.definition: A unit of measurement; an academic qualification
examples: She has a degree in biology
Despite the rain, we went out

detail.definition: A small part of something larger

examples: Determine the cause of the problem

difference.definition: The way things are not the same

dinner.definition: The main meal of the day

director.definition: A person who manages or leads

examples: Prevention is better than cure for disease
See a doctor if you're sick
The dog is man's best friend

door.definition: An entrance to a room or building

draw.definition: To make a picture; to pull
examples: Draw a circle on the paper

each.definition: Every one of two or more

examples: The sun rises in the east

economy.definition: The system of trade and money

examples: Stand at the edge of the cliff
The medicine had a good effect
Put more effort into your work

employee.definition: A person who works for someone

examples: This is the end of the story

evening.definition: The time between afternoon and night

examples: The wedding was a happy event
Have you ever been to Paris?
Keep your eye on the ball
The cows are in the field
This is my first time here

floor.definition: The bottom surface of a room

foot.definition: The body part at the end of the leg

examples: Use force to open the jar

friend.definition: A person you like and know well

fund.definition: Money set aside for a purpose

game.definition: An activity with rules for fun

examples: Get some milk from the store
The window is made of glass
My goal is to learn Spanish

government.definition: The system that rules a country

examples: Give me half of the apple

hand.definition: The body part at the end of the arm

examples: Hang your coat on the hook

head.definition: The top part of the body

examples: Hit the ball with the bat

hotel.definition: A place for travelers to stay
examples: We stayed at a nice hotel
I'll be back in an hour
If it rains, we'll stay inside
The cat is in the box
The university is a great institution
I have an interest in music
I have a job interview tomorrow

investment.definition: Money put into something for profit
examples: Real estate is a good investment
Climate change is an important issue
What kind of music do you like?
Lay the book on the table
Leave your shoes at the door
I have a lot of work

market.definition: A place to buy and sell

member.definition: A person belonging to a group

mind.definition: The thinking part of a person

miss.definition: To fail to hit; to feel sad about absence

model.definition: A representation; a person who poses

month.definition: One of twelve divisions of a year

morning.definition: The early part of the day

examples: I love spending time in nature
The store is near my house
